mapper.select: select tgom.eid,tgoods.goods_name name,tgom.amount dNumber, tgoods.amount quantity,treceipt.location ,treceipt.express_status dStatus from test_rightcontrol.goods_orders_merge tgom, test_rightcontrol.goods tgoods, test_rightcontrol.receipt treceipt where tgom.gid=tgoods.id and tgom.eid=treceipt.express_id and eid!=0
select amount from test_rightcontrol.goods where id=#{gid}
mapper.update: update test_rightcontrol.receipt set express_status=1 where express_id=#{eid}
mapper.select: select amount from test_rightcontrol.goods_orders_merge where eid=#{eid}
select gid from test_rightcontrol.goods_orders_merge where eid=#{eid}
mapper.update: update test_rightcontrol.goods set amount=amount-#{amount} where id=#{gid}
update test_rightcontrol.goods set amount=amount+100 where id=#{gid}
update test_rightcontrol.goods_orders_merge set status = 1 where eid=#{eid}
